meanings.sent1: In anesthesiologies, students learn about different types of anesthesia.
meanings.sent2: She decided to pursue a career in anesthesiologies after completing her medical degree.
meanings.sent3: The professor made the class in anesthesiologies so engaging that everyone stayed awake!
meanings.sent4: Exploring anesthesiologies is like unraveling a mystery in the medical field.
meanings.sent5: The textbooks on anesthesiologies were filled with fascinating facts and discoveries.

meanings.sent1: Her expertise in anesthesiologies ensured patients felt no pain during surgery.
meanings.sent2: The hospital hired a team of specialists to handle anesthesiologies for all procedures.
meanings.sent3: The clown joked that his job was to study anesthesiologies by making people fall asleep with laughter.
meanings.sent4: Mastering anesthesiologies is like becoming a conductor of pain relief in the operating room.
meanings.sent5: The precision required in anesthesiologies is crucial for patient safety and comfort.

meanings.definition: The branch of medicine dealing with anesthesia.
meanings.sent1: Doctors specializing in anesthesiologies play a vital role in surgical teams.
meanings.sent2: The advancements in anesthesiologies have greatly improved patient outcomes.
meanings.sent3: The anesthesiologies department always had the most calming music playing in the background.
meanings.sent4: Navigating the complexities of anesthesiologies is like being a captain in the sea of surgery.
meanings.sent5: The anesthesiologies ward was a hub of activity, ensuring every patient received proper care.
